description:
Download the official HP Game On app today! This FREE app features the HP Game On mobile scavenger hunt, in which you locate and enter QR codes at Walt Disney World Resort’s Disney Grad Nites 2011. Scanning QR codes, scattered throughout Magic Kingdom, earns you entries for a chance to win an HP dv6 Select Edition with a Disney-branded laptop sleeve and mouse pad.  The app also features the ability to submit your song requests to the DJ no matter where you are in the park.

The following instant win prizes will be awarded each night of Walt Disney World Resort’s Disney Grad Nites 2011: 
One (1) HP Mini 210 with one (1) Disney-branded laptop sleeve and mouse pad
One (1) HP Veer phone
One (1) pair of Beats by Dr. Dre Solo headphones
One (1) VIP Viewing at the Castle Stage for the Taio Cruz Set for you and up to 4 friends
One (1) VIP Viewing at the Castle Stage for the 3OH!3 Set for you and up to 4 friends
One (1) Opportunity to win a Meet and Greet with Pete Wentz for you and 1 friend
 
Features:
HP Game On mobile QR code scavenger hunt.
Earn entries into the “HP Game On Disney Grad Nite Sweepstakes.”
Track your mobile scavenger hunt progress.
Submit song requests to the on-site DJ.
 
Published by Ipsh, a division of The Marketing Arm.
